description:
CREATE TABLE Request (
Id INT PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY,
ProblemDescription NVARCHAR(255),
StartDate DATETIME,
EndDate DATETIME
);
GO

CREATE TABLE Computer (
Id INT PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY,
TechType NVARCHAR(100),
TechModel NVARCHAR(100)
);
GO

CREATE TABLE RequestComputer (
IdComputer INT,
IdRequest INT,
FOREIGN KEY (IdComputer) REFERENCES Computer(Id),
FOREIGN KEY (IdRequest) REFERENCES Request(Id),
PRIMARY KEY (IdComputer, IdRequest)
);
GO

CREATE TABLE Status (
Id INT PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY,
RequestStatus NVARCHAR(50)
);
GO

CREATE TABLE RequestStatus (
IdRequest INT,
IdStatus INT,
FOREIGN KEY (IdRequest) REFERENCES Request(Id),
FOREIGN KEY (IdStatus) REFERENCES Status(Id),
PRIMARY KEY (IdRequest, IdStatus)
);
GO

CREATE TABLE Users (
Id INT PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY,
FIO NVARCHAR(255),
RoleId INT,
PhoneNumber NVARCHAR(15)
);
GO

CREATE TABLE RequestUsers (
IdRequest INT,
IdUsers INT,
IdMaster INT,
FOREIGN KEY (IdRequest) REFERENCES Request(Id),
FOREIGN KEY (IdUsers) REFERENCES Users(Id),
FOREIGN KEY (IdMaster) REFERENCES Users(Id),
PRIMARY KEY (IdRequest, IdUsers, IdMaster)
);
GO

CREATE TABLE Comment (
Id INT PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY,
RequestId INT,
MasterId INT,
Message NVARCHAR(1000),
FOREIGN KEY (RequestId) REFERENCES Request(Id),
FOREIGN KEY (MasterId) REFERENCES Users(Id)
);
GO

CREATE TABLE Roles (
RoleId INT PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY,
Name NVARCHAR(50)
);
GO

CREATE TABLE UserRole (
UserId INT,
RoleId INT,
FOREIGN KEY (UserId) REFERENCES Users(Id),
FOREIGN KEY (RoleId) REFERENCES Roles(RoleId),
PRIMARY KEY (UserId, RoleId)
);
GO

CREATE TABLE Auth (
Id INT PRIMARY KEY,
Login NVARCHAR(50),
Password NVARCHAR(50),
FOREIGN KEY (Id) REFERENCES Users(Id)
);
GO
